title: CareBot: A Pioneering Full-Process Open-Source Medical Language Model
details: L Zhao, W Zeng, X Shi, H Zhou - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.15236, 2024
abstract: Recently, both closed-source LLMs and open-source communities have made significant strides, outperforming humans in various general domains. However, their performance in specific professional domains such as medicine, especially within the …
